attributes.action: lengthen the sentence that is given to sex offenders and paedophiles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the current sentence for sex offenders and paedophiles is not a suitable punishment due to what the crime has done to the victims and their families. They should mix in normal prisons to add to the punishment as we believe that this is one of the worst crimes that could possibly be committed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
